template.name: Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade

div.span: WESTFIELD & FIT FOR PURPOSE

Destination: Westfield Effortlessly cool and always fashionable, London is home to two premier shopping destinations – Westfield London and Westfield Stratford City. At both venues you’ll find haute couture alongside edgy urban trends and high street favourites, with hundreds of shops featuring thousands of leading fashion, home and lifestyle brands. Westfield London is home to the world’s most exclusive brands, whilst Westfield Stratford City is Europe’s largest urban shopping and leisure destination. In addition you’ll discover an excellent selection of eateries showcasing global cuisine, and first-rate leisure and entertainment facilities including state-of-the-art cinemas, a bowling alley and a casino. Dedicated multi-lingual Concierge teams are on hand with world-class exclusive services. Booking a trip to Westfield is one of the best decisions you’ll make.
Working with the Travel Trade With millions of tourists visiting Westfield each year, we are striving to develop products to accommodate these visitors. Westfield has teamed up with Capital Centric to offer a one stop shop for the travel trade to book both group and FIT customers into top restaurants at both shopping centres. You will be able to choose from a wide range of restaurants offering cuisine from all over the world, giving you and your customers a fantastic choice when tailoring your packages.
Westfield London
EXCLUSIVE SHOPPING
Westfield London is the capital’s ultimate shopping destination and is home to more than 300 shops, ranging from high street to high end.
In the Village at Westfield London your customers can purchase the most stylish and glamorous goods money can buy from celebrated brands such as Burberry, Louis Vuitton and Gucci.
Westfield Stratford City
A UNIQUE LEISURE DESTINATION
Westfield Stratford City is the largest urban shopping and leisure destination in Europe, with over 250 shops and over 65 restaurants.
In addition to its huge variety of shops and restaurants, you’ll find a dazzling array of leisure facilities including a 17-screen, all-digital Vue Cinema ,the luxury bowling experience at All Star Lanes, or the 24-hour Aspers Casino, which is the biggest in the UK.
visitGREENWICH & FIT FOR PURPOSE

Visit Greenwich, the place where hemispheres meet and royal heritage mixes with 21st century modernity. It is London’s most intriguing village and home to a World Heritage Site, Europe’s most successful entertainment arena, Britain’s first urban cable car and the Prime Meridian of the World. Take your groups to the Royal Observatory Greenwich and 0° longitude, or fly 90m high on the Emirates Air Line and into a world class show at The O2 arena. Whatever your interest we’ve got something to show you - beautiful baroque artistry in the Painted Hall, designer-made arts and crafts in Greenwich Market and the beautifully conserved Cutty Sark, the fastest ship of her age. Cruise down the river in a streamlined Thames Clipper catamaran to the world famous Royal Arsenal or explore Britain’s proud naval history at the National Maritime Museum. There’s too much to see in just one day so book your group into one our stylish 4 star hotels and stay a while. Bring your group to Greenwich for the time of their lives.

template.name: Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade

div.span: Note: Using this menu, you can add your markup amount to menus of various restaurants. This amount will be added to the price and displayed to your booking staff, so that they can quote this (final) price to the customers. Please note that this amount will be reduced on the booking completion page and you pay only the purchase amount to FIT FOR PURPOSE.
